quote: When you can't make them see the light, make them feel the heat. – Ronald Reagan
fact: Arnold Schonberg suffered from triskaidecaphobia, the fear of the number 13.  He died at 13 minutes from midnight on Friday the 13th.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: Did you hear the one about the giant pickle?  He was kind of a big dill.
